subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Knicks have well-established star players in Carmelo Anthony, Chauncey Billups and Amar’e Stoudemire, but their bench is an unknown quantity.
snippet: The Knicks have well-established star players in Carmelo Anthony, Chauncey Billups and Amar’e Stoudemire, but their bench is an unknown quantity.
